about.title: About Us
about.content: A Saudi company specialized in the entertainment sector provides its services to companies and government entities. Noy specializes in using its expert creative team to create exceptional events for each client through innovative attention to detail to provide a customized experience that meets each client's aspirations and goals, paying attention to all necessary details.

items.title: Exhibition Management and Organization
items.description: We make exhibitions and conferences in Saudi Arabia an unforgettable event.

items.title: Technical and Technological Equipments
items.description: Exhibitions, conferences, lectures, brand launches, agreements, press conferences, and more.

items.title: Event Business Management
items.description: Supervision and assistance throughout the event, providing advice on venue selection and negotiation.

items.title: Media Coverage
items.description: Local and international platforms, influencers, content creators, journalists, writers, and editors.

items.title: Protocol
items.description: Writing invitation letters and occasion cards, informing invitees of the appropriate place and time, and more.

items.title: Crowd Management
items.description: Organizing entry and exit movements, coordinating and following up with relevant authorities.

items.title: Project Content Innovation
items.description: Designing and producing digital content, preparing printed materials, building visual and linguistic identity.

items.title: Photography and Video
items.description: Preparing reports, delivering all digital recordings to the client.

items.title: Logistics
items.description: Expertly managing all logistics operations to ensure the smoothness and success of your event.

aboutUs.label: About the Company
aboutUs.title: Get to Know Us Up Close
aboutUs.content: 22 expert individuals passionately dedicate their efforts to organizing and preparing various conferences and events. From the first word written in event details, they innovate creative solutions for people to talk about in the end... It's our specialty that we work with.
aboutUs.missionText: Creating exceptional experiences for clients through innovation, creativity, and achieving goals in the best possible ways.
aboutUs.visionText: To be the leading company in the field of organizing events and exhibitions in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and the region.
aboutUs.messageText: Providing high-quality services and dedication to work to achieve satisfaction and excellence for our clients.

projects.title: Exhibition Organization

projects.title: Conference Organization
projects.description: We work innovatively and provide high-quality equipment to make each participant's experience reflect their personal interests.
